description: The project provide support in the Anseba region in building the capacity of the zoba as well as in the decentralization as a pilot project. The project is funded by UNDP and UNCDF.

subproject.description:
Previously this output focused on strenghening the capacity of the Anseba Region in participatory development processes including planning, project implementation and monitoring. Under this output the following were achieved: access to & management of financial resources for funding development plans by Local Government Units in Anseba was improved; regional & local capacities to deliver, operate and maintain projects efficiently were strengthened (e.g., micro-dam based water supply systems).

As per the new cooperation agreement with the government, the output has been streamlined to fit the new Government priorities (water supply, health and sanitation) in 2012.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: ProvideAdequate&SafeWater-ALDP
